name: Cyto Survivor
description:
One Last Stand Against COVID-19

---

You are Cyto, the last white blood cell that could save this body from being defeated.  Shoot your antibodies to defeat influenza and COVID-19!

Cyto Survivor is a mobile 2D top-down shooter game with handcrafted pixel art, a unique hero, and based on current events. 

Move around the arena dodging and shooting enemies with your antibody projectiles in order to survive and reach a kill score before facing off against the Covid-19 boss. 

Kill the COVID-19 Boss to win the game and save the body!

---

Cyto Survivor was developed by Ubercell, a fictional game company and group formed for CS 113 at the University of California, Irvine (Fall '20). 

Ubercell is a company that focuses on developing mobile games on Unity. Games developed by Ubercell are meant to be fun, free of charge, and easily accessible. 

Ubercell members and their roles:

Vincent Tran - Game, Animation, and Pixel Art Designer

Jack Yang Huang - Game, Arena, and Sound Designer

Benson Wu - Game Developer

Ivan Casillas - Game Developer

Matthew Tang - Game Developer

Cameron Alexander Andrews - Game Developer
